name: Armageddon MUD Tools and MUSHclient Plugins
tagline: In-Game Clocks and MUSHclient plugins designed for Armageddon MUD.
body:
# [MUSHclient](http://www.gammon.com.au/mushclient/) Plugins
For [Armageddon](http://armageddon.org/), by @robertpateii

## Generic Installation Instructions
1. Download the desired plugin.
1. Open MUSHclient.
1. Navigate to File / Plugins.
1. Click the "Add" button.
1. Navigate to the downloaded file and click Open.
1. Close the "Plugins" menu and proceed to play.

## Status Infobar

* Displays your character's vital stats in a bar below your command line.
* _You must type *InstallInfobar* once you are logged into your character to setup your prompt._
* [Download](https://raw.github.com/robertpateii/armageddon-plugins/master/Arma_Infobar.xml)

## Combat Highlights

* Minimal highlights for keeping track during busy combat scenes.
* [Download](https://raw.github.com/robertpateii/armageddon-plugins/master/Arma_Highlights.xml)
